Material: AMETHYST; CARNELIAN; STEATITE/SOAP STONE; FAIENCE; SHELL (NILE)
Name: Bracelet
Description: A small string of beads, possibly originally a bracelet, made from natural and manmade beads of different shapes and sizes. There is a large oval shaped carnelian bead at the centre and a smaller single bead of amethyst (top right in image). Other beads are fluted and bugle shaped.
